items.sentence: Perhaps we shouldn\'t be talking about this here.
Please turn off the light before you go to sleep.
We shared the money evenly among the three of us.
We told the waiter that everything was delicious.
Tom doesn\'t have the answer to Mary\'s question.
Tom doesn\'t have to come if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom doesn\'t have to help if he doesn\'t want to.
It\'s my money. I can do whatever I want with it.
Tom usually watches the news while eating dinner.
Tom was my best friend when I was in high school.
